alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 8:39PM CDT until May 03 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. .Rivers within the southern Red River Basin are expected to continue their recession. No significant precipitation is expected in the next 7 days. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Harwood. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 86.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 85.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Friday was 86.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue falling to 82.1 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 84.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
